title: Misconception about the Night before Eid | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: shabbir says people in India and Pakistan think that the night before they eat they call it lailatul Jaya is a is something that Allah would answer your supplication and you answer your door and you must must not go shopping on that night and you have to spend it in vicar and supplication this is all baseless this is all and an innovation we spend the night throughout the whole year 360 days nights in prayer because this is a Sunnah but to specify their aid with such rituals this is an innovation
